output.mean_keff: grep 'best estimate system k-eff' *.out | head -1 | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i=="k-eff") print $(i+1)}' 2>/dev/null || echo 1.0
output.sigma_keff: grep 'best estimate system k-eff' *.out | head -1 | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i=="-") print $(i+1)}' 2>/dev/null || echo 0.001
output.mean_E_lethargy: grep 'Energy of average lethargy of Fission' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $7}' 2>/dev/null || echo 100
output.sigma_E_lethargy: grep 'Energy of average lethargy of Fission' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $10}' 2>/dev/null || echo 10
output.mean_nubar: grep 'system nu bar' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $4}' 2>/dev/null || echo 1.0
output.sigma_nubar: grep 'system nu bar' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $7}' 2>/dev/null || echo 0.001
output.mean_free_path: grep 'system mean free path' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $5}' 2>/dev/null || echo 1.0
output.sigma_free_path: grep 'system mean free path' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $8}' 2>/dev/null || echo 0.001
